title: More Troubling Questions Emerge About the Election (Ep 1395)
description:
In this episode, I discuss the stunning new information emerging about the use of Dominion Voting Systems in the 2020 elections. I also address the interesting election developments in Nevada and Georgia. 

News Picks:

More stunning news about Dominion Voting Systems.


More discrepancies discovered in Nevada, where an election is thrown into dispute.

Georgia discovers over a thousand “missing” votes.  


This 2012 article describes another scenario where there were issues with Dominion Voting Systems.


Target backs down after backlash to their decision to start banning a book.

Lenin Project (Lincoln Project) promoted targeting project flops after backlash ensues.


More tech tyranny as GOP groups are targeted again. 


The left can’t beat us, so they must destroy us.
